value.title: StarCraft 2: AMAZING MATCH - GuMiho vs Vanya! (Game of the Year?)
value.excerpt: One of the best games of professional StarCraft 2 of 2021 for sure. In this epic game of Zerg versus Terran between Vanya and GuMiho, we watch a game that begins as every game does, but quickly spirals out of control. value.title: StarCraft 2: AMAZING Widow Mine Connections! (Cure vs Rogue)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Cure and Rogue. This series starts off with normal build orders, but quickly evolves to something much greater as both players test a variety of strategies.  Match is from the OlimoLeague December finals.
